mapper.insert: insert into app_prizes_number (prize_channel, prize_type, prize_number, create_time) values (#{prizeChannel}, #{prizeType}, #{prizeNumber}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM app_prizes_number WHERE prize_channel = #{prizeChannel} AND prize_type = #{prizeType}
mapper.update: UPDATE app_prizes_number SET prize_number = prize_number + #{prizeNumber} WHERE prize_channel = #{prizeChannel} AND prize_type = #{prizeType}
